data.SOURCE:
@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'CDS Dados Itens Monitor InBound'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}
@Metadata.allowExtensions: true
define view entity /EXEDMINB/I_NFeMonitorI
  as select from /EXEDMINB/I_NFeMonitorI_Base as _NFeItemBase

  association to parent /EXEDMINB/I_NFeMonitorH as _Header on _Header.ChaveNFe = $projection.ChaveNFe
  
  association [0..1] to /EXEDMINB/I_UN_EMIT_NFE as _UnForXSap on _UnForXSap.ChaveNFe = $projection.ChaveNFe
                                                             and _UnForXSap.unFor    = $projection.UnidadeMedida

{
  key _NFeItemBase.ChaveNFe,
  key _NFeItemBase.ItemNFe,
  key _NFeItemBase.ItemIdDiv,
      _NFeItemBase.Pedido,
      _NFeItemBase.ItemPedido,
      concat(_NFeItemBase.Pedido, case when _NFeItemBase.ItemPedido is initial then '' else concat('/', _NFeItemBase.ItemPedido ) end) as PedidoItem,
      _NFeItemBase._PurchaseOrderItem.Plant,
      cast( _NFeItemBase._PurchaseOrderItem.Material as matnr) as Material,
      _NFeItemBase._PurchaseOrderItem.PurchaseOrderItemText as DescricaoMaterial,
      _NFeItemBase.DescricaoMaterialFornecedor,
      _NFeItemBase.NCM,
      _NFeItemBase.CFOP,
      _NFeItemBase.Quantidade,
      _NFeItemBase.ValorUnitario,
      _NFeItemBase.UnidadeMedidaXML,
      _UnForXSap.unSap as UnidadeMedida,
      _NFeItemBase.Lote,
      _NFeItemBase.Origem,
      _NFeItemBase.AliquotaICMS,
      _NFeItemBase.ValorICMS,
      _NFeItemBase.AliquotaIPI,
      _NFeItemBase.ValorIPI,
      

      _Header
}
/*+[internal] {

],

],
